name: WAMOTOPIA
description: Wamotopia is a pivotal gathering focused on future-oriented culture and consensus-driven approaches, resembling an urban odyssey akin to Burning Man. Scheduled from December 16, 2023, to January 1, 2024, in Chiang Mai, Thailand, it aims to construct a prototype society. The event integrates Web3, AI technology, and humanistic futurism, attracting geeks, artists, and creators from diverse backgrounds. Wamotopia explores new societal values and meanings through theme camps and spontaneous activities, striving to build an open, collaborative, and decentralized society that is more inclusive and sustainable.
